profile.name: Achraf Mansari
profile.about:
Iâ€™m a 2nd year Masterâ€™s student in Data Science at ENSA Khouribga, actively seeking an end-of-studies internship (Stage PFE) starting from February 2026 in projects related to AI & ML, Data Science or software engineering.

I develop and deploy full-stack applications, integrate machine learning models, and work with structured/unstructured data to create practical, maintainable solutions.

My skills include :
- AI & Data Science: Python (Pandas, NumPy, Scikit-learn, Matplotlib), Data Cleaning, Statistical Analysis, Predictive Modeling, Dashboards.
- Web Development: ReactJS, Django, Flask, REST APIs, API optimization.
- Deployment & Cloud: Docker, AWS, Heroku, Railway, Vercel.
- Databases: PostgreSQL, MySQL.

If your team is working on innovative AI or ML projects and needs a motivated, adaptable intern ready to contribute from day one, letâ€™s talk!

experiences.title: Intern
experiences.description:
Automated LinkedIn lead generation with AI and WhatsApp integration


Developed a full-stack (Django + React) chatbot-like platform for LinkedIn lead generation with an automated pipeline (Apache Airflow) to transform prompts into filters (via Gemini), run profile searches (SerpAPI), enrich results (ScrapingDog), and store them in a database, and currently working on WhatsApp Business integration for automated outreach and replies.
